portfolio_description: Skilled Front-End Developer with over 3 years of experience building high- performance web apps. Proficient in JavaScript, React, NextJS, and modern front-end technologies. Expert in creating responsive, accessible, and user-friendly interfaces, with a focus on best practices, performance optimization, and teamwork to deliver scalable solutions. Additionally experienced in developing APIs with ExpressJS, Django, and Flask.
portfolio_about_description_1: I am a Full Stack Developer with a strong focus on building scalable, high-performance web applications.
portfolio_about_description_2: With over three years of professional experience, I specialize in React, TypeScript, and Next.js, among other modern front-end technologies.
portfolio_about_description_3: My passion lies in creating user-friendly, responsive interfaces that prioritize performance optimization and accessibility.
portfolio_about_description_4: In my most recent role as a Front-end Developer, I led the development of several large-scale projects, utilizing modern technologies like ReactJS, Ant Design, Redux, and Tailwind CSS.
portfolio_about_description_5: I have experience as a mentor, providing guidance on web development topics and helping students build a strong foundation in technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and ReactJS.
experience_freshdi_project_1: Lead the development of scalable web applications using React, MUI, Redux, and TypeScript to build a global marketplace to help buyers and suppliers connect with each other.
experience_freshdi_project_2: Collaborated closely with UX/UI designers and backend teams to develop user-friendly, responsive, and scalable web applications.
experience_freshdi_project_3: Optimized the performance of web applications through code splitting, lazy loading, and efficient state management.
experience_freshdi_project_4: Reviewed code to ensure adherence to best practices and maintain code quality.
experience_freshdi_project_5: Worked closely with backend teams to integrate APIs, ensuring seamless data flow between frontend and backend services.
experience_freshdi_project_6: Enhanced the website's SEO through keyword optimization and technical improvements, leading to increased organic traffic and better Google indexing.
experience_phoenixunity_project_1: Utilized technologies such as ReactJS, Ant Design, Tailwind CSS, Redux, and Next.js across various projects for foreign partners such as Australia and Brazil.
experience_phoenixunity_project_2: Ensured adherence to coding standards and best practices, fostering a collaborative environment for feedback and improvement, which enhanced code quality, maintainability, and scalability.
experience_phoenixunity_project_3: Implemented code optimizations by analyzing performance bottlenecks and refactoring critical components, using techniques like code splitting and lazy loading to reduce load times and improve responsiveness, resulting in a smoother user experience and decreased resource consumption.
experience_vtiacademy_project_1: Instructor for both basic and advanced web programming courses, covering topics like HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and ReactJS.
experience_vtiacademy_project_2: Provided personalized mentorship, giving students feedback on coding assignments, and guiding them through debugging and problem-solving techniques.
experience_vtiacademy_project_3: Developed a Node.js server using the ExpressJS framework to provide real-time API services and backend support for the front-end course projects.
